ComicInfo.Title: Notes #37; It's a Bitchy, Bitchy (etc.) World (Pt. 2); Let's Go to Makah Days!; Sick Kitty Comix (Part 2)
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-18 12:25:52. [CVDB164620] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 22:44:11. [Issue ID 170750]
ComicInfo.Summary:
Midge's Mom and Aunt Hazel see her shopping and assume she's a spend-thrift. Kenny sends her a copy of the photography consent form she drunkenly signed in his bedroom. Barb and Lanie have to deal with their daughter Tanya being taught they're sinners in an after-school program, and the teacher turns out to be Marcie. The school gets rid of Marcie, but she comes back to work and Sylvia assigns Midge to "get her back on board."
Roberta and two friends go to the Makah Nation reservation to visit an annual celebration
Roberta's cat requires hospitalization
